Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel Azithromycin (0.12 - 4 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Bacterial colonies grown on solid media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel for Azithromycin susceptibility testing in aerobic streptococci using MIC determination and instrument read capability
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility of aerobic streptococci, including Streptococcus pneumoniae, to Azithromycin using manual or instrument read methods
